codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests 1&quot;)
Dim myInt as Integer
testSuite.describe(&quot;Test error&quot;).assertEqualsInteger(1, myInt)  &apos;Fails, actual is 0
myInt = 1
testSuite.describe(&quot;Test success&quot;).assertEqualsInteger(1, myInt)  &apos;Succeeds
commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Core unit testing suite.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
codesamplehtml: Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests 1&quot;)<br />Dim myInt as Integer<br />testSuite.describe(&quot;Test error&quot;).assertEqualsInteger(1, myInt)  &apos;Fails, actual is 0<br />myInt = 1<br />testSuite.describe(&quot;Test success&quot;).assertEqualsInteger(1, myInt)  &apos;Succeeds

methods.label: addCustomBeforeAfter

Dim beforeAfter as New IntegerIncrementBeforeAfter()   &apos; Extends AbstractCustomBeforeAfter
Call testSuite.addCustomBeforeAfter(beforeAfter)

methods.label: assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray
methods.comment: Tests two variant or variant arrays are the same.
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite As New TestSuite(|Variant Array Tests|)
Dim a(7) As Variant, b() As Variant
Dim i As integer
    
For i = 0 To UBound(a)
    a(i) = i
Next
    
Call testSuite.describe(|Test array and not array|).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(a, 1)   &apos; Returns false, expected is array, actual is not
    
ReDim b(0)
b(0) = 0
Call testSuite.describe(|Test unequal array length|).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(a, b)    &apos; Returns false, elements in arrays not equal
    
ReDim b(i - 1)
For i = 0 To UBound(b)
    b(i) = i
Next
Call testSuite.describe(|Test equal arrays|).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(a, b)   &apos; Returns true
    
b(0) = 1
Call testSuite.describe(|Test first element different|).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(a, b)   &apos; Returns false, element 1 not matching
methods.signature: Public Function assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(expected As Variant, actual As Variant) As Boolean
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Tests two variant or variant arrays are the same.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Tests two variant or variant arrays are the same.
methods.inlinecomment: ' Tests two variant or variant arrays are the same.
methods.codesamplehtml: Dim testSuite As New TestSuite(|Variant Array Tests|)<br />Dim a(7) As Variant, b() As Variant<br />Dim i As integer<br />    <br />For i = 0 To UBound(a)<br />    a(i) = i<br />Next<br />    <br />Call testSuite.describe(|Test array and not array|).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(a, 1)   &apos; Returns false, expected is array, actual is not<br />    <br />ReDim b(0)<br />b(0) = 0<br />Call testSuite.describe(|Test unequal array length|).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(a, b)    &apos; Returns false, elements in arrays not equal<br />    <br />ReDim b(i - 1)<br />For i = 0 To UBound(b)<br />    b(i) = i<br />Next<br />Call testSuite.describe(|Test equal arrays|).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(a, b)   &apos; Returns true<br />    <br />b(0) = 1<br />Call testSuite.describe(|Test first element different|).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(a, b)   &apos; Returns false, element 1 not matching

methods.label: assertEqualsString
methods.comment: Tests whether two strings match, applying basic case sensitivity as required (LCase-ing expected and actual).
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Test strings&quot;)
Dim expected as String
expected = &quot;Hello World&quot;
Call testSuite.describe(&quot;Test Strings match&quot;).assertEqualsString(expected, &quot;hello world&quot;, True)   &apos; Returns true, matches case insensitive
Call testSuite.describe(&quot;Test Strings do not match&quot;).assertEqualsString(expected, &quot;hello world&quot;, False)   &apos; Returns true, case is different
methods.argumentsuffix: (expected As String, actual As String, caseInsensitive As Boolean)
methods.signature: Public Function assertEqualsString(expected As String, actual As String, caseInsensitive As Boolean) As Boolean

expected = 2.5
Call testSuite.describe(&quot;Test Subtraction&quot;).assertEqualsDouble(expected, 5 - 3.5)

actual = 4

methods.label: assertNotEqualPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray
methods.comment: Compares two variants or variant arrays and tests they are not the same, CStr-ing non-arrays
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Test primitives&quot;)
Dim actual as Integer
actual = 2
Call testSuite.describe(&quot;Test primitive&quot;).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(3, actual)
Call testSuite.describe(&quot;Test primitive data types&quot;).assertEqualsPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(&quot;2&quot;, actual)   &apos; Returns false, CStr(actual) matches &quot;2&quot;
methods.signature: Public Function assertNotEqualPrimitiveOrPrimitiveArray(expected As Variant, actual As Variant) As Boolean

methods.comment: Duration of tests
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Slept report&quot;)
Sleep(120)
Call testSuite.endTimer()
Print &quot;Tests ran for &quot; &amp; testSuite.duration &amp; &quot; seconds&quot;)

methods.label: getErrorMsg
methods.comment: Converts error message to human readable format.
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Try
    Error 1502, &quot;Not implemented&quot;
Catch
   Print testSuite.getErrorMsg()
End Try

Print testSuite.getOutputFormat()   &apos; Print &quot;HTML&quot;

methods.label: includeInTestRunner
methods.comment: Sets this test as included in a TestRunner. Called by TestRunner.addTestSuite().
methods.codesample:
Sub addTestSuite(testSuite as TestSuite)
    Set me.testSuites(testSuite.title) = testSuite
    Call testSuite.includeInTestRunner(me.title).outputTo(getFilePath())
End Sub
methods.signature: Public Function includeInTestRunner(testRunnerName As String) As TestSuite
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Sets this test as included in a TestRunner. Called by TestRunner.addTestSuite().</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Sets this test as included in a TestRunner. Called by TestRunner.addTestSuite().
methods.inlinecomment: ' Sets this test as included in a TestRunner. Called by TestRunner.addTestSuite().
methods.codesamplehtml: Sub addTestSuite(testSuite as TestSuite)<br />    Set me.testSuites(testSuite.title) = testSuite<br />    Call testSuite.includeInTestRunner(me.title).outputTo(getFilePath())<br />End Sub

methods.label: ranSuccessfully
methods.comment: Whether there are errors, failures or missing assertions
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Tests&quot;)
Dim emptyVar as Variant
Call testSuite.describe(&quot;First Test&quot;).assertTrue(IsEmpty(emptyVar))
If (testSuite.ranSuccessfully) Then Print &quot;Success&quot;

methods.label: addError
methods.comment: Adds a test error to the results.
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Error Suite&quot;)
Try
  Call testSuite.describe(&quot;Error test&quot;)
  Error 1500, &quot;Error thrown&quot;
Catch
  Call addError(&quot;Error &quot; &amp; Error() &amp; &quot; on line &quot; &amp; Erl(), GetThreadInfo(12))
End Try

methods.label: checkStarted
methods.comment: Checks whether an assertion has been run yet and, if not, starts the timer and runs beforeAll if a CustomBeforeAfter has been passed in.
methods.codesample:
Private Class CustomTester as AbstractCustomTester
    Function runTests as Boolean
        Call Me.testSuite.checkStarted()
       
       &apos; Run tests
    End Function
End Class
methods.signature: Public Sub checkStarted()
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Checks whether an assertion has been run yet and, if not, starts the timer and runs beforeAll if a CustomBeforeAfter has been passed in.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Checks whether an assertion has been run yet and, if not, starts the timer and runs beforeAll if a CustomBeforeAfter has been passed in.
methods.inlinecomment: ' Checks whether an assertion has been run yet and, if not, starts the timer and runs beforeAll if a CustomBeforeAfter has been passed in.
methods.codesamplehtml: Private Class CustomTester as AbstractCustomTester<br />    Function runTests as Boolean<br />        Call Me.testSuite.checkStarted()<br />       <br />       &apos; Run tests<br />    End Function<br />End Class

methods.label: completeReport
methods.comment: Ends time, triggers afterAll if a CustomBeforeAfter has been passed in, and prints out the report.
methods.codesample:
Sub Delete
    Call Me.completeReport()
End Sub

methods.label: endTimer
methods.comment: Sets endime to Timer
methods.codesample:
Dim testSuite as New TestSuite(&quot;Slept report&quot;)
Sleep(120)
Call testSuite.endTimer()
Print &quot;Tests ran for &quot; &amp; testSuite.duration &amp; &quot; seconds&quot;)

methods.label: runAfterEach
methods.comment: Tests whether a AbstractCustomBeforeAfter has been passed in and, if so, calls afterEach. Triggered from automatically all in-built assertions.
methods.codesample:
Dim globInt as Integer
Class IntegerIncrementer as AbstractCustomBeforeAfter
    Sub beforeEach()
        a = a + 1
    End Sub
    Sub afterEach()
        Print &quot;Finished test&quot;
    End Sub
End Class
Private Class CustomTester as AbstractCustomTester
    Function runTests as Boolean
        Dim incrementer as New IntegerIncrementer()
        Call Me.testSuite.addCustomBeforeAfter(incrementer)
        Call Me.testSuite.checkStarted()
       
       Call Me.testSuite.runBeforeEach()   &apos; Increments a global variable
       Call Me.testSuite.describe(&quot;Test global variable&quot;).assertEqualsInteger(1, globInt)
       Call Me.testSuite.runAfterEach()
    End Function
End Class
methods.signature: Public Sub runAfterEach()
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Tests whether a AbstractCustomBeforeAfter has been passed in and, if so, calls afterEach. Triggered from automatically all in-built assertions.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>

methods.label: runBeforeEach
methods.comment: Tests whether an AbstractCustomBeforeAfter has been passed in and, if so, calls beforeEach. Triggered from automatically all in-built assertions.
methods.codesample:
Dim globInt as Integer
Class IntegerIncrementer as AbstractCustomBeforeAfter
    Sub beforeEach()
        a = a + 1
    End Sub
    Sub afterEach()
        Print &quot;Finished test&quot;
    End Sub
End Class
Private Class CustomTester as AbstractCustomTester
    Function runTests as Boolean
        Dim incrementer as New IntegerIncrementer()
        Call Me.testSuite.addCustomBeforeAfter(incrementer)
        Call Me.testSuite.checkStarted()
       
       Call Me.testSuite.runBeforeEach()   &apos; Increments a global variable
       Call Me.testSuite.describe(&quot;Test global variable&quot;).assertEqualsInteger(1, globInt)
       Call Me.testSuite.runAfterEach()
    End Function
End Class
